CustomField.description: Click here to enforce G2 Bypass in case of the exceptions: Oppty >= 20M, MultiBG, Contract renewal or nth phase of the running contract
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Click here to enforce G2 Bypass in case of the exceptions: Oppty >= 20M, MultiBG, Contract renewal or nth phase of the running contract
CustomField.label: Multi BG Exception/ Allow G2 Bypass
